import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { X } from 'lucide-react'; const AddInventoryModal = ({ isOpen, onClose }) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ sku: '', name: '', category: '', price: '', cost: '', quantity: '', minStock: '', supplier: '', description: '' }); const categories = [ 'Electronics', 'Clothing', 'Books', 'Home & Garden', 'Sports', 'Toys', 'Footwear' ]; const suppliers = [ 'Apple Inc.', 'Samsung', 'Nike', 'Adidas', 'Amazon', 'Best Buy', 'Target' ]; const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Here you would typically send the data to your API console.log('Form submitted:', formData); onClose(); }; if (!isOpen) return null; return (
